name: Season 8 Starter Pass
description:
SMITE Season 8 starts now! Go ahead and play GOD in SMITE, the #1 MOBA on Xbox.

Get started on the Battleground with the Season 8 Starter Pass, FREE for all Game Pass Ultimate Subscribers. The Starter Pass includes the exclusive Enyo Bellona and Buccaneith Neith skins, three Goddesses featured in the Most Wanted Battle Pass, and a 3 Day Account Booster that will increase your favor, experience, and worshipper gain rates. Plus: Unlock a Daily Deal bundle of your choice, containing three great cosmetics chosen just for you.

Includes: - Enyo Bellona Skin - Buccaneith Neith Skin - Aphrodite - Kali - Pele - Daily Deal Token - 3 Day Account Booster

This offer does not include the Most Wanted Premium Battle Pass. Visit the Deals tab in the Store to redeem your Daily Deal Token.
